Articles.Content: How can I use Realism Overhaul in my KSP installation of 1.12.2 if its only rated for 1.10 and below. When I install RO and launch the game, loading gets stuck on one file early on, and does not load any more after that. Any suggestions as to get RO working in 1.12.2?
Welcome to the forum @abach2131, your question has been moved from KSP discussions to Add-on discussions because you are looking for mod advice.

The short answer is you don't.  Or rather you wait until it's ready.  It's a hairy monster of a mod and updating it takes time and effort.  The devs work on it when they have the time and it's strictly volunteer work. 

Some folks have dug through the mod and all it's dependencies to make it work for them, but these are personal efforts and not really distributable.

It's frustrating, but it is the nature of user created content.

You don’t. RO is huge, complicated and will take a lot of work to make it work properly with 1.12; work which is happening, albeit slowly, while new features are also being added. Stick to 1.10, or if you’re really desperate, grab the WIP 1.12 pull request from the RO GitHub and use that (at your own risk!).
